sectionAbout.title: About Me
sectionAbout.description: Here you will find detailed information about who I am and how I can assist you with my current programming and technology skills.

info.p_1: I am a front-end developer, creating and managing interfaces for websites and web applications that contribute to the overall success of the product. Check out my work in the Projects section.
info.p_2: I also enjoy sharing content related to what I have learned over the years in web development so I can connect with other people in the developer community. Feel free to connect or follow me on my <github>GitHub</github> and <linkedin>LinkedIn</linkedin>.
info.p_3: I am open to job opportunities where I can contribute, learn, and grow. If you have a good opportunity that matches my skills and experience, don't hesitate to reach out to me.

sectionProjects.title: Projects
sectionProjects.description: Here you will find some of the personal and client projects I have created, with each project featuring its own case study.

sectionContact.title: Contact
sectionContact.description: Feel free to contact me by sending the form below, and I will get back to you as soon as possible.
